name: market for precious metal refinery | precious metal refinery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/107/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'precious metal refinery', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a precious metal refinery. The infrastructure represents a plant of 5,000 m2, equipped with 1 Electrolyte cell, 1 Eluation cell, 5 Electrowinning cell, 1 Calcination furnace, 1 Smelting furnace, 1 Electrorefining cell. It has a yearly capacity of anode slime treatment of 243 tons with an assumed lifetime assumed of 25 years. The process includes building materials and their decommission, and land use.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
